msg: Updating the date for Xalan-J 2.7.1 release and

author: awiner
msg: Move XmlHttpConfigurator wrapping to beforePhase() of RESTORE_VIEW to avoid getting a
request parameter too early, and thereby breaking the later call to setCharacterEncoding()
